laboratory_examinations.findings: Potassium: 20 mEq/L, Sodium: 84 mEq/L, Chlorine: <20 mEq/L, Stool osmotic gap: 82 mOsm/kg

Moderate villous blunting with mildly increased inflammatory cells in the lamina propria, intraepithelial lymphocytosis, irregular vacuolated appearance of enterocytes at the villous tips, abnormal pattern of PAS and CD10 staining.
Detected Homozygous c.1323-2A>G mutation of the MYO5B gene.
No muscular or neurologic abnormality, Microvillus inclusions detected by electron microscopy.
